content:
Subject: Follow-up on Concreate's Proposal for Lokum Tech Tutorials

Dear Ece,

I hope this email finds you in good health and spirits. I am writing to follow up on the proposal document that Concreate sent to Lokum Tech for creating tutorials. Tofi informed me that he had discussed the proposal with you, and you were going to send it to us.

We are excited about the prospect of creating tutorials for Lokum Tech and believe it could
